analysis.key_quote: Civil service is by definition apolitical. With the execution of this proposed rule, meritocracy will be replaced by partisanship and sycophancy.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of an apolitical civil service and expressing concerns about the shift from meritocracy to partisanship, which aligns with the themes of politicization and merit-based system concerns.
